#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

=Statistics=

The Imgur Statistics API gives access to site statistics and individual image statistics.

==Details==

  * *URL*: http://imgur.com/api/stats
  * *URL*: http://imgur.com/api/stats/IMAGE_HASH
  * *Method*: GET (HTTP)

==Return Formats==

  * *XML*: http://imgur.com/api/stats.xml (default)
  * *XML*: http://imgur.com/api/stats/IMAGE_HASH.xml (default)
  * *JSON*: http://imgur.com/api/stats.json
  * *JSON*: http://imgur.com/api/stats/IMAGE_HASH.json

_Obviously, replace IMAGE_HASH with the actual image hash._

==Parameters==

_Only for site statistics._

  * 'view' - View certain images based on the date the images were added:
    * 'today' - The past 24 hours,
    * 'week' - The past 7 days,
    * 'month' - The past month (default).

==Examples==

*cURL*: 

_Site Statistics_
{{{
curl "http://imgur.com/api/stats.xml"
}}}

_Image Statistics:_
{{{
curl "http://imgur.com/api/stats/RKLHR.json"
}}}

==Sample Output==

*XML - Image Statistics*
{{{
<stats>
	<views>146,345</views>
	<size>107053</size>
	<bandwidth>15666671285</bandwidth>
	<date>2009-09-16 02:26:09</date>
	<type>image/jpeg</type>
</stats>
}}}

*XML - Site Statistics*
{{{
<stats>
	<most_popular_images>
		<image_hash>h9Guq</image_hash>
		<image_hash>PuIht</image_hash>
		<image_hash>UfB6c</image_hash>
		<image_hash>z45uZ</image_hash>
		<image_hash>MGqb7</image_hash>
	</most_popular_images>
	<images_uploaded>133718</images_uploaded>
	<images_veiwed>132152948</images_veiwed>
	<bandwidth_used>23288486706064</bandwidth_used>
	<average_image_size>178039.55612740</average_image_size>
</stats>
}}}

*JSON - Image Statistics*
{{{
{
    "stats": {
        "views": 146,345,
        "size": 107053,
        "bandwidth": 15666671285,
        "date": "2009-09-16 02:26:09",

{{{
{
    "stats": {
        "most_popular_images": ["h9Guq", "PuIht", "UfB6c", "z45uZ", "MGqb7"],
        "images_uploaded": 133718,

==Possible Errors==

|| *Code* || *Message* ||
|| 3000 || Invalid image hash ||
|| 3001 || Invalid stats view request ||
|| 9000 || Invalid API request ||
|| 9001 || Invalid response format ||
